        Parameters:
        eventTitle - event Title in schedule
        eventMeetingDays - event meeting days in schedule
        eventStartTime - event start time in schedule
        eventEndTime - event end time in schedule
        eventDetails - event details in schedule

      • addCourseToSchedule

        public boolean addCourseToSchedule​(java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section)
        search and add the course that have this name and section to schedule
        Parameters:
        name - name of the course for searching
        section - section of the course for searching
        Returns:
        true if the course exist in the catalog and has not been added in the schedule
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if course is duplicate and meeting time is conflict with other activity

      • removeActivityFromSchedule

        remove activity from the schedule
        Parameters:
        idx - index of the activity to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the course is in the schedule and removed successfully
